PC Number Date Chapter Chapter Year Bill Dept
 2024-11612024-11-01VAC
ActVeterans Review and Appeal Board Act
PrecisAppointment of LLOYD HOGAN of Cape Breton, Nova Scotia, to be a permanent member of the Veterans Review and Appeal Board, to hold office during good behaviour for a term of five years, effective January 16, 2025.
AttachmentsAttachment
precis: Appointment of LLOYD HOGAN of Cape Breton, Nova Scotia, to be a permanent member of the Veterans Review and Appeal Board, to hold office during good behaviour for a term of five years, effective January 16, 2025.
